commentBody:
Another Ben Shpigel attack on the Patriots.

Somehow he manages not to include Joe Flacco and Russel Wilson in his comments on the QBs the Patriots have faced this year.

I'm surprised he restrained himself from any mention of DeflateGate.

After all, Tom Brady's only had two of the best years of his career after allegedly playing with deflated footballs his whole career, last year leading the team within one play of another Super Bowl appearance but let's not mention that, it's a post-truth world.

Shpigel vilified Brady as a cheater and a sham yet somehow remains quiet on the Giants' playing with deflated footballs or their use of walkie-talkies?
